snippet: Ranger Rick Jr., featuring Ricky Raccoon, a mascot for children ages 4 to 7, is a new magazine from the National Wildlife Federation, which is tapping into interest in ecology at an earlier age.
abstract: National Wildlife Federation, which publishes Ranger Rick children's magazine, is starting a counterpart for even younger readers aged 4 to 7, called Ranger Rick Jr.
lead_paragraph: Ranger Rick Jr., featuring Ricky Raccoon, a mascot for children ages 4 to 7, is a new magazine from the National Wildlife Federation, which is tapping into interest in ecology at an earlier age.

headline.seo: A New Wildlife Magazine for Younger Children
headline.main: A New Wildlife Magazine Aimed at the Very Young
headline.print_headline: A New Wildlife Magazine Aimed at the Very Young
